page.title: 20Authors of the Project.
page.content: The Domesday Project has been compiled by the pupils of Biddulph High School.It has been the task of the editorial team listed below to select the material.The contents reflect the attitudes and beliefs of the team who are representative of the area. The help of Mr Roger Shaw-Harrisson was invaluable for the aerial survey in both supplying and piloting the plane. Ecological survey was by Sarah Elkin,Anne Rivers,David Beresford and co-ordinated by Miss Cathy Hannam. Photography was by David Kellock. Editorial team consisted of; Helen Elizabeth Berrigan; Karen Reynolds; Andrew Daniel Baker; Louise Dowley; Claire Baker; Jill Hurlstone; Christine Baker; Julie Randall. Survey data was co-ordinated by Ms.Carole Johnson. Project co-ordinator was Mr.R.Baker.
